entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 26. Humidex 32. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
